sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="cmn_skill"> <cmn_skill action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <description>Ability to pace, wander and saturate your mind with an idea, take a nap and wake up to a possible solution in the next immediate shower taken or within 10 minutes of realizing where you are and that you were supposed to actually solve a problem AND get rest.</description> <name>Sleep Driven Design</name> <sys_class_name>cmn_skill</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-10-07 01:55:30</sys_created_on> <sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update> <sys_id>1daef1b1dbda26006c98f03d0f961989</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Sleep Driven Design</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>cmn_skill_1daef1b1dbda26006c98f03d0f961989</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-10-07 01:55:30</sys_updated_on> </cmn_skill> </record_update>
